<S%H3201>"Can<s%> I not, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3335>potter<s%> [does]?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> like the <S%H2563>clay<s%> in the potter's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are you in My <S%H3027>hand,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

if that <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from its <S%H9567>evil,<s%> I will <S%H5162>relent<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H9567>calamity<s%> I <S%H2803>planned<s%> to <S%H6213>bring<s%> on it.

if it <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight<s%> by not <S%H8085>obeying<s%> My <S%H6963>voice,<s%> then I will <S%H5162>think<s%> <S%H5162>better<s%> of the <S%H9186>good<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H3190>bless<s%> it.

"So <S%H6258>now<s%> then, <S%H559>speak<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H3335>fashioning<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you and <S%H2803>devising<s%> a <S%H4284>plan<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you. <S%H4994>Oh<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3190>reform<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>deeds.<s%> "'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7592>'Ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> ever <S%H8085>heard<s%> the like of <S%H428>this<s%>? The <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> Has <S%H6213>done<s%> a <S%H3966>most<s%> <S%H9624>appalling<s%> <S%H9624>thing.<s%>

'Does the <S%H7950>snow<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the open <S%H9583>country<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> is the <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H5140>flowing<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> [from] a <S%H2114>foreign<s%> [land] ever <S%H5428>snatched<s%> <S%H5428>away<s%>?

'For My <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> Me, They <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H7723>worthless<s%> gods And they have <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> from their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> From the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H7635>paths,<s%> To <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H9350>bypaths,<s%> Not on a <S%H1870>highway,<s%> <S%H5549><s%>

To <S%H7760>make<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> [An object of] <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8292>hissing;<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by it will be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> And <S%H5110>shake<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

'Like an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them <S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H340>enemy;<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> them My <S%H6203>back<s%> and not [My] <S%H6440>face<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity.<s%>' "

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>plans<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is not going to be lost to the <S%H6>priest,<s%> <S%H3548>nor<s%> <S%H3808>counsel<s%> to the <S%H6098>sage,<s%> <S%H2450>nor<s%> the [divine] <S%H3808>word<s%> to the <S%H1697>prophet!<s%> <S%H5030>Come<s%> on and let us <S%H1980>strike<s%> at him with [our] <S%H5221>tongue,<s%> and let us <S%H3956>give<s%> <S%H7181>no<s%> <S%H408>heed<s%> to <S%H7181>any<s%> of his <S%H3605>words.<s%>"
Do <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H6963>what<s%> my <S%H3401>opponents<s%> are <S%H6963>saying!<s%>

Should <S%H9186>good<s%> be <S%H9608>repaid<s%> with <S%H9567>evil<s%>? For they have <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H7745>pit<s%> for me. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> how I <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee To <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H9186>good<s%> on their <S%H5921>behalf,<s%> So as to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from them.

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> over to <S%H7458>famine,<s%> And <S%H5064>deliver<s%> them up to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> And let their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H9599>childless<s%> and <S%H490>widowed.<s%> Let their <S%H376>men<s%> also be <S%H2026>smitten<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> Their <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

May an <S%H2201>outcry<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> Thou <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>bringest<s%> <S%H1416>raiders<s%> upon them; For they have <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H7745>pit<s%> to <S%H3920>capture<s%> me And <S%H2934>hidden<s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%> for my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

Yet Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H6098>designs<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; Do not <S%H3722>forgive<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> Or <S%H4229>blot<s%> out their <S%H9128>sin<s%> from Thy <S%H6440>sight.<s%> But may they be <S%H3782>overthrown<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee; <S%H6213>Deal<s%> with them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of Thine <S%H639>anger!<s%>
